Subscription.Description: Provides visibility of driver loads, remote thread creation and process access, and sysmon configuration changes
Subscription.Query: <QueryList> <!-- All other sysmon events - Sysmon service state change, driver loads, remote thread creation and sysmon configuration info --> <Query Id="0" Path="Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational"> <Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational"> *[System[(EventID=4 or EventID=6 or EventID=8 or EventID=16)]] </Select> </Query> </QueryList>
